title: Monroe Township, Lincoln County, Missouri
text:
Monroe Township is an inactive <a href="civil%20township">township</a> in <a href="Lincoln%20County%2C%20Missouri">Lincoln County</a>, in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Missouri">Missouri</a>.
Monroe Township was established in 1819, taking its name from the community of <a href="Old%20Monroe%2C%20Missouri">Old Monroe, Missouri</a>.
